attributes.action: help trainees caught up in the failure of Property Professionals +.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This company went into administration last week leaving more than 1,000 trainees unable to complete training for which they had paid up to £10,000. The company had been the subject of many complaints to Trading Standards, ABBE and Dept of Communities and Local Government but nothing was done in time to prevent this failure. Trainees include those who have invested savings and redundancy payments as well as former military personnel.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to help trainees caught up in the failure of Property Professionals.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Help-PP-trainees


Her Majesty's Government
